{"id":501260285,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1622534491,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/501260285/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"44.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    public int maxAreaOfIsland(int[][] grid) {\n        int max=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.length;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=0;j<grid[i].length;j++)\n            {\n                if(grid[i][j]==1)\n                 max=Math.max(sink(grid,i,j),max);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n    }\n    private int sink(int[][] grid,int i,int j)\n    {\n        if(i<0 || i> grid.length-1 || j<0 || j>= grid[0].length || grid[i][j]==0)\n             return 0;\n        grid[i][j]=0; //Sink\n        return 1+sink(grid,i+1,j)+sink(grid,i,j+1)+sink(grid,i-1,j)+sink(grid,i,j-1);\n    \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
